SELECT wc.id AS wallet_id, wc.cash_balance, wc.`status`, t.* FROM wallet_cash wc, ( SELECT cm.id AS company_member_id, cm.`name`, cm.ic_no, cm.department, cm.employee_no, cm.phone FROM company c, company_member cm WHERE c.id = #{companyId} AND cm.company = c.id
AND cm.department like concat('%',#{department},'%')
AND cm.`name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
) t WHERE wc.company_member = t.company_member_id ORDER BY wallet_id DESC
